sentences.sContent: Called up for military service, Mr. Marokvia spent the war as an illustrator for the Wehrmacht, applying brush and pencil in Ukraine, Italy, Finland and Yugoslavia.
sentences.sContent_eng: Called up for military service, Mr. Marokvia spent the war as an illustrator for the Wehrmacht, applying brush and pencil in Ukraine, Italy, Finland and Yugoslavia.
sentences.sCn: 玛洛克维亚先生被征召入伍，他作为一名德国国防军的插图画家，在乌克兰、意大利、芬兰和南斯拉夫留下了自己的墨迹。

synos.tran: 插图画家；说明者；图解者

words.tran: 说明的；作例证的；解说的

trans.tranOther: someone who draws pictures, especially for books
